title.description: Blue, centered title at the top.

score.description: Numeric score representing the user's alcohol intake.

Type.description: Primary dial to select drink type.

Size.description: Secondary dial that updates based on 'Type' selection, showing relevant drink sizes.

Strength.description: Tertiary dial that updates based on 'Type' to show alcohol strengths.

Dial.behavior: Dials are interlinked; choosing a 'Type' updates 'Size' options, and so forth.

successNotification.description: Toast notification after a drink addition.

useCaseScenario: Mike spins the 'Type' dial to 'Wine', then selects size and strength using the subsequent dials. The score is updated.
